subtitle: Mushrooms stuffed with chopped courgettes, tomatoes and fresh basil. Prepare this starter beforehand and just pop in the oven 15-20 min before eating.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and fry until just soft.
Add the garlic, courgettes and tomatoes. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer gently until thick, stirring occasionally.
Add the basil and tomato puree. Season to taste.
Stir the stalks from the smaller mushrooms into the vegetable mixture.
Spoon the mixture into the large mushrooms.
Bake for 15-20 min until thoroughly heated. Serve.

title: Stuffed mushrooms
